flashcards.front: 你好，今天天气真不错。
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ hǎo, jīntiān tiānqì zhēn búcuò.
flashcards.back: Hey there, the weather sure is nice today.

flashcards.front: 你常来这里喝咖啡吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ cháng lái zhèlǐ hē kāfēi ma?
flashcards.back: Do you come here often for coffee?

flashcards.front: 我喜欢浅焙咖啡，你呢？
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan qiǎnbèi kāfēi, nǐ ne?
flashcards.back: I like a light roast coffee, how about you?

flashcards.front: 听说台北附近有好几处海滩。
flashcards.pinyin: Tīngshuō Táiběi fùjìn yǒu hǎojǐ chù hǎitān.
flashcards.back: I heard there are a bunch of beaches near Taipei.

flashcards.front: 天气热的时候，你会去海边吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Tiānqì rè de shíhou, nǐ huì qù hǎibiān ma?
flashcards.back: When it gets hot, do you head to the beach?

flashcards.front: 这家咖啡店有什么推荐吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Zhè jiā kāfēi diàn yǒu shénme tuījiàn ma?
flashcards.back: Got any recommendations at this coffee shop?

flashcards.front: 这里的拿铁很香，你要试试吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Zhèlǐ de nátiě hěn xiāng, nǐ yào shìshi ma?
flashcards.back: Their latte here smells great, want to try it?

flashcards.front: 听说台北夜市的吃的也不错。
flashcards.pinyin: Tīngshuō Táiběi yèshì de chī de yě búcuò.
flashcards.back: I hear the food at the Taipei night markets is pretty good.

flashcards.front: 你最喜欢吃什么小吃？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ zuì xǐhuan chī shénme xiǎochī?
flashcards.back: What's your favorite snack?

flashcards.front: 我第一次来台北，能给我一些建议吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ dì yī cì lái Táiběi, néng gěi wǒ yīxiē jiànyì ma?
flashcards.back: This is my first time in Taipei, got any tips for me?

flashcards.front: 你觉得这儿的天气潮湿吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ juéde zhèr de tiānqì cháoshī ma?
flashcards.back: Do you think it's pretty humid around here?

flashcards.front: 你们这儿下雨会很频繁吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐmen zhèr xiàyǔ huì hěn pínfán ma?
flashcards.back: Does it rain often around here?

flashcards.front: 我打算去淡水看夕阳。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ dǎsuàn qù Dànshuǐ kàn xīyáng.
flashcards.back: I'm planning on heading to Tamsui to watch the sunset.

flashcards.front: 你可曾去过阳明山赏花？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ kěcéng qùguò Yángmíngshān shǎnghuā?
flashcards.back: Have you ever visited Yangmingshan to see the flowers?

flashcards.front: 咖啡配甜甜圈，真不错。
flashcards.pinyin: Kāfēi pèi tiántiánquān, zhēn búcuò.
flashcards.back: Coffee and a donut, not too bad!

flashcards.front: 这家店的老板人很好。
flashcards.pinyin: Zhè jiā diàn de lǎobǎn rén hěn hǎo.
flashcards.back: The owner here is a really nice person.

flashcards.front: 下次再见面时，带你去尝美食。
flashcards.pinyin: Xià cì zài jiànmiàn shí, dài nǐ qù cháng měishí.
flashcards.back: Next time we meet, I'll take you for some good eats.

flashcards.front: 早上好，您每天都来公园跳舞吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Zǎoshang hǎo, nín měitiān dōu lái gōngyuán tiàowǔ ma?
flashcards.back: Morning, do you come to the park to dance every day?

flashcards.front: 这个舞蹈看起来很有意思。
flashcards.pinyin: Zhège wǔdǎo kànqǐlái hěn yǒu yìsi.
flashcards.back: This dance sure looks interesting.

flashcards.front: 我能学一点简单的动作吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ néng xué yīdiǎn jiǎndān de dòngzuò ma?
flashcards.back: Could I learn a few simple moves?

flashcards.front: 跳舞前，你会先吃早餐吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Tiàowǔ qián, nǐ huì xiān chī zǎocān ma?
flashcards.back: Do you usually grab breakfast before dancing?

flashcards.front: 您觉得上海的菜是不是有点甜？
flashcards.pinyin: Nín juéde Shànghǎi de cài shì búshì yǒudiǎn tián?
flashcards.back: Do you think Shanghai dishes are kinda sweet?

flashcards.front: 您有没有推荐的老上海小吃？
flashcards.pinyin: Nín yǒu méiyǒu tuījiàn de lǎo Shànghǎi xiǎochī?
flashcards.back: Got any old-time Shanghai snacks you'd recommend?

flashcards.front: 我听说这边小笼包很有名。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ tīngshuō zhè biān xiǎolóngbāo hěn yǒumíng.
flashcards.back: I heard soup dumplings are famous around here.

flashcards.front: 您年轻时，上海是啥样子的？
flashcards.pinyin: Nín niánqīng shí, Shànghǎi shì shá yàngzi de?
flashcards.back: What was Shanghai like when you were younger?

flashcards.front: 我对中国古代历史很感兴趣。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ duì Zhōngguó gǔdài lìshǐ hěn gǎn xìngqù.
flashcards.back: I'm pretty interested in ancient Chinese history.

flashcards.front: 您读过三国演义吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Nín dúguò Sānguó Yǎnyì ma?
flashcards.back: Have you read Romance of the Three Kingdoms?

flashcards.front: 公园里有不少人打太极拳。
flashcards.pinyin: Gōngyuán lǐ yǒu bùshǎo rén dǎ tàijíquán.
flashcards.back: There are quite a few folks practicing Tai Chi in the park.

flashcards.front: 我想去博物馆看看文物。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng qù bówùguǎn kànkan wénwù.
flashcards.back: I'd like to check out some artifacts at the museum.

flashcards.front: 下雨天也会来跳舞吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Xiàyǔ tiān yě huì lái tiàowǔ ma?
flashcards.back: Do you still come dancing when it rains?

flashcards.front: 这里的老人都很热情。
flashcards.pinyin: Zhèlǐ de lǎorén dōu hěn rèqíng.
flashcards.back: The elderly folks here sure are friendly.

flashcards.front: 您喝茶还是喝咖啡？
flashcards.pinyin: Nín hē chá háishì hē kāfēi?
flashcards.back: Do you drink tea or coffee?

flashcards.front: 天气转凉了，小心别感冒。
flashcards.pinyin: Tiānqì zhuǎn liáng le, xiǎoxīn bié gǎnmào.
flashcards.back: The weather is getting cooler, be careful not to catch a cold.

flashcards.front: 改天一起去吃点小吃吧。
flashcards.pinyin: Gǎi tiān yīqǐ qù chī diǎn xiǎochī ba.
flashcards.back: Let's go grab some street food together next time.

flashcards.front: 天气转凉了，小心别感冒。
flashcards.pinyin: Tiānqì zhuǎn liáng le, xiǎoxīn bié gǎnmào.
flashcards.back: The weather is getting cooler, be careful not to catch a cold.

flashcards.front: 新年快乐，恭喜发财。
flashcards.pinyin: Xīnnián kuàilè, gōngxǐ fācái.
flashcards.back: Happy New Year, wish you prosperity.

flashcards.front: 我应该怎么称呼您的长辈？
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ yīnggāi zěnme chēnghu nín de zhǎngbèi?
flashcards.back: How should I address your elders?

flashcards.front: 这道鱼有什么特别的意义吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Zhè dào yú yǒu shénme tèbié de yìyì ma?
flashcards.back: Does this fish dish have any special meaning?

flashcards.front: 是不是大年三十的时候要守岁？
flashcards.pinyin: Shìbúshì dànián sānshí de shíhou yào shǒusuì?
flashcards.back: Is it true we stay up late on New Year's Eve?

flashcards.front: 我可以帮忙包饺子吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ kěyǐ bāngmáng bāo jiǎozi ma?
flashcards.back: Can I help make dumplings?

flashcards.front: 这些亲戚都是怎么排辈分的？
flashcards.pinyin: Zhèxiē qīnqi dōu shì zěnme pái bèifèn de?
flashcards.back: How are these relatives all ranked in the family?

flashcards.front: 听说红包要用新的钞票。
flashcards.pinyin: Tīngshuō hóngbāo yào yòng xīn de chāopiào.
flashcards.back: I heard you need crisp new bills for the red envelopes.

flashcards.front: 过年的习俗是不是很多？
flashcards.pinyin: Guònián de xísú shìbúshì hěn duō?
flashcards.back: Are there a whole bunch of customs for New Year?

flashcards.front: 我是第一次跟这么多人一起过年。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ shì dì yī cì gēn zhème duō rén yīqǐ guònián.
flashcards.back: This is my first time celebrating with so many people.

flashcards.front: 要不要给长辈敬茶？
flashcards.pinyin: Yàobùyào gěi zhǎngbèi jìng chá?
flashcards.back: Should I serve tea to the elders?

flashcards.front: 年糕是象征年年高升吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Niángāo shì xiàngzhēng niánnián gāoshēng ma?
flashcards.back: Is the sticky rice cake a sign of rising higher each year?

flashcards.front: 来，给你拜个年。
flashcards.pinyin: Lái, gěi nǐ bài ge nián.
flashcards.back: Here, let me offer you my New Year greetings.

flashcards.front: 大家一起看春晚吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Dàjiā yīqǐ kàn Chūnwǎn ma?
flashcards.back: Is everyone watching the New Year Gala together?

flashcards.front: 我还不会正确说'舅舅'和'叔叔'。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ hái bù huì zhèngquè shuō 'jiùjiu' hé 'shūshu'.
flashcards.back: I'm still not sure how to say 'Uncle on mom's side' and 'Uncle on dad's side' properly.

flashcards.front: 记得要给晚辈发红包吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Jìde yào gěi wǎnbèi fā hóngbāo ma?
flashcards.back: Don't forget to hand out red envelopes to the younger folks, right?

flashcards.front: 大年初一能不能打扫房子？
flashcards.pinyin: Dànián chūyī néng bu néng dǎsǎo fángzi?
flashcards.back: Can we clean the house on New Year's Day?

flashcards.front: 你们家都有啥拜年礼仪？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐmen jiā dōu yǒu shá bài nián lǐyí?
flashcards.back: What's your family's usual way of paying New Year visits?

flashcards.front: 你喜欢喝绿茶还是红茶？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuan hē lǜchá háishì hóngchá?
flashcards.back: Do you prefer green tea or black tea?

flashcards.front: 周末有什么计划吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Zhōumò yǒu shénme jìhuà ma?
flashcards.back: Any plans for the weekend?

flashcards.front: 我的手机快没电了。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ de shǒujī kuài méi diàn le.
flashcards.back: My phone is almost out of battery.

flashcards.front: 昨天的电影好看吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Zuótiān de diànyǐng hǎokàn ma?
flashcards.back: Was yesterday's movie any good?

flashcards.front: 你听过这首歌吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ tīngguò zhè shǒu gē ma?
flashcards.back: Have you heard this song before?

flashcards.front: 我想学做中餐。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng xué zuò zhōngcān.
flashcards.back: I want to learn how to cook Chinese food.

flashcards.front: 下午我们去公园散步吧。
flashcards.pinyin: Xiàwǔ wǒmen qù gōngyuán sànbù ba.
flashcards.back: Let's take a walk in the park this afternoon.

flashcards.front: 你有空的时候喜欢做什么？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu kòng de shíhou xǐhuan zuò shénme?
flashcards.back: What do you like to do in your free time?

flashcards.front: 我下个月要去旅行。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ xià gè yuè yào qù lǚxíng.
flashcards.back: I'm going on a trip next month.

flashcards.front: 请问卫生间在哪里？
flashcards.pinyin: Qǐngwèn wèishēngjiān zài nǎlǐ?
flashcards.back: Excuse me, where is the restroom?

flashcards.front: 你每天都准时起床吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ měitiān dōu zhǔnshí qǐchuáng ma?
flashcards.back: Do you wake up on time every day?

flashcards.front: 我正在学中文。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ zhèngzài xué Zhōngwén.
flashcards.back: I'm currently learning Chinese.

flashcards.front: 周五晚上我们一起吃饭吧。
flashcards.pinyin: Zhōu wǔ wǎnshàng wǒmen yīqǐ chīfàn ba.
flashcards.back: Let's have dinner together on Friday night.

flashcards.front: 这家餐厅的菜很有特色。
flashcards.pinyin: Zhè jiā cāntīng de cài hěn yǒu tèsè.
flashcards.back: This restaurant's dishes are quite unique.

flashcards.front: 今天我很忙，没有时间休息。
flashcards.pinyin: Jīntiān wǒ hěn máng, méiyǒu shíjiān xiūxí.
flashcards.back: I'm very busy today, I have no time to rest.

flashcards.front: 你怎么来这里的？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ zěnme lái zhèlǐ de?
flashcards.back: How did you get here?

flashcards.front: 别忘了带伞，外面会下雨。
flashcards.pinyin: Bié wàngle dài sǎn, wàimiàn huì xiàyǔ.
flashcards.back: Don't forget to bring an umbrella; it might rain outside.

flashcards.front: 你认识这里的其他人吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ rènshi zhèlǐ de qítā rén ma?
flashcards.back: Do you know anyone else here?

flashcards.front: 我想去书店买一本中文词典。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng qù shūdiàn mǎi yī běn Zhōngwén cídiǎn.
flashcards.back: I want to go to the bookstore to buy a Chinese dictionary.

flashcards.front: 学汉字需要多练习。
flashcards.pinyin: Xué Hànzì xūyào duō liànxí.
flashcards.back: Learning Chinese characters requires lots of practice.

flashcards.front: 这道菜咸了点。
flashcards.pinyin: Zhè dào cài xián le diǎn.
flashcards.back: This dish is a bit too salty.

flashcards.front: 你觉得这双鞋好看吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ juéde zhè shuāng xié hǎokàn ma?
flashcards.back: Do you think these shoes look good?

flashcards.front: 我今天要去银行办点事。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān yào qù yínháng bàn diǎn shì.
flashcards.back: I need to go to the bank for some errands today.

flashcards.front: 这家店打折吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Zhè jiā diàn dǎzhé ma?
flashcards.back: Does this shop have any discounts?

flashcards.front: 我打算周末跟朋友聚一聚。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ dǎsuàn zhōumò gēn péngyǒu jù yī jù.
flashcards.back: I plan to hang out with friends this weekend.

flashcards.front: 你会用筷子吗？
flashcards.pinyin: Nǐ huì yòng kuàizi ma?
flashcards.back: Do you know how to use chopsticks?

flashcards.front: 我想去超市买点水果。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng qù chāoshì mǎi diǎn shuǐguǒ.
flashcards.back: I want to go to the supermarket to buy some fruit.

flashcards.front: 他明天要搬家。
flashcards.pinyin: Tā míngtiān yào bānjiā.
flashcards.back: He is moving tomorrow.

flashcards.front: 我喜欢在早上读书。
flashcards.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan zài zǎoshang dúshū.
flashcards.back: I like to read in the morning.

flashcards.front: 明天记得给我打电话。
flashcards.pinyin: Míngtiān jìde gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà.
flashcards.back: Remember to call me tomorrow.
